name: Rebel Strider
description:
Marauder Orcs have invaded the colony, and brought the stomping, mechanical terrors known as Stuntbots.  You and your fellow GCPS Marines have been ordered to abandon the colonists to their fate.  It might get you branded as a Rebel but you won't leave these people to die.  Not if you and your Strider have anything to say about it

A Strider is a walking, weapon platform with all the fire power you need to beat back the invaders.

Defeat the 3 Stuntbots and save the colony!

Made as part of #MechJam2021 have inspired by the Warpath Universe from Mantic Games

Controls

WASD - Movement

J - Confirm / Chain saw

K - Polaris Cannon

Credits

"Contravirt" by Virt (OCRemix)
